casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terance Germaine MALACHI 142PA17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 26, 2019 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Malachi, Terance Germaine. John R. Green, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of March 2019 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of March 2019."
